features.name: Authentication
features.description: Email/password authentication via Supabase Auth with login page and session management

features.name: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
features.description: Route protection based on user roles (admin, chairman, financial_secretary, security_officer) via middleware

features.name: Dashboard Layout
features.description: Collapsible sidebar navigation with role-filtered items, header with user dropdown, and responsive mobile design

features.name: Dashboard Home
features.description: Stats overview cards showing Total Residents, Houses, Payments with quick action buttons

features.name: Houses Module
features.description: House management with table listing, create/edit forms, filtering by street, and house type management

features.name: Residents Module
features.description: Resident management with table listing, create/edit forms, auto-generated 6-digit codes, status filtering, and house linking

features.name: Payments Module
features.description: Payment records with table listing, create form with currency input, bulk actions, CSV export, and receipt printing

features.name: Billing & Invoices
features.description: Invoice generation, overdue checking, billing profiles management, and wallet system

features.name: Wallet System
features.description: Resident wallet balance display with manual adjustment dialog for credits/debits

features.name: Reference Management
features.description: Settings for managing streets and house types with billing profile associations

features.name: Security Contacts
features.description: Read-only security contact list with access codes and validity periods

features.name: Supabase Client
features.description: Supabase client configuration supporting both local and cloud modes via environment variables

features.name: Currency Input Component
features.description: Custom input component for monetary values with comma formatting and decimal support

features.name: Form Validation
features.description: Zod schemas for form validation across all modules

features.name: Audit Logging
features.description: Activity logging for CREATE, UPDATE, DELETE operations with actor tracking
